body_html: I firmly believe that this should work in all cases. And empirically it has even lowered the data loading shutdown overhead a bit for me when training LeNets on MNIST. I'm training 9000 LeNets on multiple processes to see if any still hangs. (Previously I can't train 200 without seeing hanging on one rank).

body: I firmly believe that this should work in all cases. And empirically it has even lowered the data loading shutdown overhead a bit for me when training LeNets on MNIST. I'm training 9000 LeNets on multiple processes to see if any still hangs. (Previously I can't train 200 without seeing hanging on one rank).
